snippet: After lying in state in Pretoria for three days, Nelson Mandela’s body will be transferred to his childhood village, Qunu, for burial on Sunday.
abstract: Thousands of South Africans file past body of Nelson Mandela for third and final day before it is transferred to his childhood village of Qunu for burial.

byline.original: By JOHN ELIGON and ALAN COWELL
byline.contributor: John Eligon reported from Qunu, and Alan Cowell from London.

lead_paragraph: After lying in state in Pretoria for three days, Nelson Mandela’s body will be transferred to his childhood village, Qunu, for burial on Sunday.

headline.main: Thousands Gather in South Africa’s Capital to Get a Final Glimpse of Mandela
headline.print_headline: Thousands Gather in South Africa’s Capital to Get a Final Glimpse of Mandela
